description.black-white:
The user attacks the target with fire.
If the target is holding a Berry, the
Berry becomes burnt up and unusable.
description.black-2-white-2:
The user attacks the target with fire.
If the target is holding a Berry, the
Berry becomes burnt up and unusable.
description.x-y:
The user attacks opposing Pokémon with fire.
If a Pokémon is holding a certain item, such as a
Berry, the item becomes burned up and unusable.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
The user attacks opposing Pokémon with fire.
If a Pokémon is holding a certain item, such as a
Berry, the item becomes burned up and unusable.

The user attacks opposing Pokémon with fire.
If a Pokémon is holding a certain item, such as a
Berry, the item becomes burned up and unusable.

The user attacks opposing Pokémon with fire.
If a Pokémon is holding a certain item, such as a

description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user attacks opposing Pokémon with fire.
If a Pokémon is holding a certain item, such as a
Berry, the item becomes burned up and unusable.
description.sword-shield:
The user attacks opposing Pokémon with fire.
If a Pokémon is holding a certain item, such as a
Berry, the item becomes burned up and unusable.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is holding a berry, it's destroyed and cannot be used in response to this move.
